name: 3 Hours Downtown, Waterfront & Gastown
description: An easy 3 hour walking tour that combines history, street art, architecture and much more. If you are tight for time, but want to get a great feel of what the city  is all about, this is the tour for you. This tour appeals to visitors of all ages. Total distance covered over the course of the tour is approximately 2 kms / 1.25 miles.
